Package it.polimi.ingsw.snapshots

Class SquareSnapshot

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.snapshots.SquareSnapshot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class SquareSnapshot
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class contains all info relative to a specific square that clients are going to need. It implements Serializable in order to be able to be sent to the client.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean ammoSquare
      Indicates whether ammo can be found on the square.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> cards
      List of strings which represent the cards that can be grabbed from this square
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> cardsCost
      List of strings which represent the costs of all the cards that can be grabbed from this square
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> colors
      List of strings that represent the colors associated with the players standing on the square
      java.lang.String east
      String that represents what type of border the square's right border is
      java.lang.String name
      Coordinates used to distinguish the square from all the others on the map.
      java.lang.String north
      String that represents what type of border is present right above the square
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> players
      List of players standing on the square

    • Field Detail

      • ammoSquare

        public final boolean ammoSquare
        Indicates whether ammo can be found on the square. In case it isn't an ammo square, it means the square is a shop.

      • name

        public final java.lang.String name
        Coordinates used to distinguish the square from all the others on the map.

      • north

        public final java.lang.String north
        String that represents what type of border is present right above the square

      • south

        String that represents what type of border is present right below the square

        String that represents what type of border the square's left border is

      • east

        String that represents what type of border the square's right border is

        private final java.util.List<java.lang.String> players
